description: An identification of a personnel capability used during a specified segment response shall be presented as personnel actual.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The related object(s) makes up part of this personnel actual as the whole

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: The values in the personnel actual property are for this personnel actual.

contents.name: correspondsToPersonnelClass
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the personnel model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated personnel class or set of personnel classes specified

contents.name: correspondsToPerson
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the personnel model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated person or set of persons specified. Typically, either personnel class or person is specified, but not both

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the process segment

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: spatialDefinition
contents.description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

contents.name: operationalLocationRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: operationalLocation
contents.description: Identifies the operational location of the personnel resource(s)  specified by this personnel segment specification

contents.name: operationalLocationType
contents.description: Indicates whether the operational location attribute refers to an operational location object or contains a description of the operational location. Mandatory where an operational location attribute is specified

enumValues.name: operationalLocation
enumValues.description: operational location attribute references an operational location;

enumValues.name: description
enumValues.description: operational location attribute contains a description of the operational location, such as a street address.

contents.name: personnelUse
contents.description: Defines the actual use of the personnel class or personnel in the context of the parent segment

contents.name: quantity
contents.description: Specifies the personnel resource used for the parent segment

contents.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity
